notes:
click on a tile in the tile select
bar in the top right of the screen
this world scares me
MOUSE-WHEEL = ZOOM

the space bar randomises the
drawing colour

hold ALT on the keyboard and
then LEFT-CLICK on a colour
to select that as your
drawing colour (colour picker)

hold ALT and then LEFT-CLICK on
a tile to copy that tile and
place more of them (tile picker)

LEFT-CLICK and HOLD on the icon in the toolbar, and
drag to position your new character or notebox
press the play button to test your game!!

type text into me
to set my dialogue
you can drag in new characters and note/dialogue boxes

this is a
-- game -

select the DRAW tool from the toolbar
(top left of the screen)
LEFT-CLICK to place the tile in the map

the number keys (1, 2, 3, ...)
change the size of your brush
draw on the characters too!

draw on the tiles to change
your game

whilst drawing something, or dragging something
e.g pencil / tiles / character / note
RIGHT-CLICK to delete or erase instead

hold the RIGHT-MOUSE-BUTTON and drag
to move around the game scene

everything is great!!

create new rooms and spaces!!
LEFT-CLICK and drag to draw
